sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 'STG_BEG_FACT_TRANSACCIONS' AS TAULA
      ,'@{concat(substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,0,4),'-',substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,4,2))}' AS DATA_CARREGA
      , 'ERROR' AS ESTAT
      , '@{replace(replace(string(activity('STG_BEG_TRANSACCIONS').output.errors[0].Message),'''',''),'"','')}' AS ERROR
      ,getdate() AS DATA_INSERCIO
